articles.author: Javier Espinoza, Financial Times
articles.title: Concerns over addicted kids spur probe into Meta and its use of dark patterns - Ars Technica
articles.description: EU is concerned Meta isn't doing enough to protect children using its apps.
articles.content:
51
Brussels has opened an in-depth probe into Meta over concerns it is failing to do enough to protect children from becoming addicted to social media platforms such as Instagram.
The European Comm… [+2697 chars]
